abstract: JPMorgan Chase said Wednesday that its third-quarter profit fell 84 percent, suffering a steep decline amid continued trouble with mortgages and other loans — but still avoiding the loss that many research analysts had expected.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said Wednesday that its third-quarter profit fell 84 percent, suffering a steep decline amid continued trouble with mortgages and other loans — but still avoiding the loss that many research analysts had expected.

abstract: JPMorgan Chase, Wells Fargo, and State Street announced earnings that beat expectations, but their shares fell on fears of a drawn-out erosion of the economy.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase, Wells Fargo, and State Street announced earnings that beat expectations, but their shares fell on fears of a drawn-out erosion of the economy.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase, Wells Fargo, and State Street have weathered these bad times better than most banks. But things are about to get worse.

headline.main: Banks Brace for Slump as Economy Weakens
headline.print_headline: Banks Brace for Slump As Economy Weakens

abstract: Six government agencies, including the F.B.I. and I.R.S., are looking into what led regulators to close the bank.
snippet: Six government agencies, including the F.B.I. and I.R.S., are looking into what led regulators to close the bank.
lead_paragraph: Federal investigators have organized a task force to examine any wrongdoing at Washington Mutual, the troubled savings bank that regulators seized and sold to JPMorgan Chase late last month.

headline.main: Federal Investigators to Examine Washington Mutual
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Examine Actions Of Washington Mutual
